 2022-12292022-11-25,  PWGSC,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Post Corporation Act
PrecisApproval of the re-appointment by the Minister of Public Works and Government Services of CLAUDE GERMAIN of Oakville, Ontario, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canada Post Corporation, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years.
